text: gotta rescue car troubled family, will try and be back for standup!

`{"statusCode":400,"error":"Bad Request","message":"child \"requests\" fails because [\"requests\" at position 0 does not match any of the allowed types]","validation":{"source":"payload","keys":["requests.0"]}}`
I am posting the timestamp as a long instead of a string, not sure if that causes a parsing error? should the timestamp be a string?
It should work as a number or a string
so you’re good there

cool
<@U02F8TTPU> is that token expired?

starting afresh
ahh I see, there's a 401 unauthorized on other (atomic) requests
did you get a new access token I could try?

user: <mailto:test@test.com|test@test.com>, pass: password
it's the autofilled credentials that were already in the app
I never made a new user...
that’s fine..

also, I believe the timestamp parameter is case sensitive and should be all lowercase
